name: Ball Platformer (itch)
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move

Escape to return to the main menu

There are three levels to complete. Each level will contain pick ups, which the player will need to collect to move on. The amount of pick ups required, along with the amount collected is displayed at the top left and center portion of the screen respectively.

Collecting the required amount of pick ups will allow players to move on to the next level upon finishing the current level.

If the player reaches the end of the level before acquiring the required amount of pick ups, the level will reset.

Falling out of bounds or running into traps will also reset the level.
